item.armament.supernova.desc.1: Forged with the heart of a dying star, this sword hums with celestial energy. Within its hilt lay pure cosmic power, ready wreck destruction at any moment.
item.armament.supernova.desc.3: Does AoE damage to nearby mobs
item.armament.zeus_thunderbolt.desc.1: "Crafted by the hand of the mighty god Zeus, this thunderous weapon channels the fury of the heavens. Its crackling energy strikes with the force of a storm, bringing divine retribution upon all who stand before it."
item.armament.truthseeker.desc.1: "In the relentless pursuit of knowledge, its blade carves through the veil of ignorance, severing falsehoods and casting light into the darkest corners of understanding. Each swing carries the weight of unspoken truths, leaving a path of shattered illusions and unyielding clarity in its wake."
item.armament.truthseeker.desc.3: Gain 100% increased experience from all sources
item.armament.terraton_hammer.desc.1: "Forged from the unyielding core of an ancient golem, this colossal hammer carries the weight of forgotten eons. Each strike echoes with the power of the earth, capable of shattering stone and bone alike. Wield it wisely, for its strength demands a heavy toll."
item.armament.terraton_hammer.desc.3: Deal massive damage at the cost of movement and attack speed
item.armament.divine_axe_rhitta.desc.1: "A colossal battle axe imbued with the boundless power of the sun. Originally wielded by Lion Sin Escanor, the One who stands at the pinnacle of all races."
item.armament.divine_axe_rhitta.desc.3: Right click to summon a miniature sun that ignites all nearby mobs
item.armament.leaf_blower.desc.1: A powerful yet lightweight tool for clearing debris with ease. Perfect for everyday yard work, it makes quick work of unwanted clutter.
item.armament.leaf_blower.desc.3: Push nearby entities away with force, ideal for clearing out areas quickly
item.armament.terra_blade.desc.1: "A legendary weapon said to contain the essence of numerous swords, the Terra Blade holds unparalleled strength and power, forged to vanquish darkness and chaos from the world of Terraria."
item.armament.terra_blade.desc.3: Shoots out a powerful wave of sword energy
item.armament.doomfist_gauntlet.desc.1: "Wielded by a long line of Doomfists, it embodies raw power and ambition. With each devastating punch, it echoes dominance upon the battlefield."
item.armament.doomfist_gauntlet.desc.3: Charge up a forceful punch that launches the user forwards, transfer the user's kinetic energy into any opposing mobs within its radius.
item.armament.jackpot.desc.1: "A whimsical hammer with a slot machine for a head, the Jackpot combines luck and strength in every swing."
item.armament.jackpot.desc.3: Randomizes damage with each swing, delivering unpredictable power to your foes. Attack must be fully charged.
item.armament.event_horizon.desc.1: "This ornate lance, forged in the depths of a swirling vortex, holds within it the secrets of the cosmos. A miniature black hole, stabilized and contained, pulses with an otherworldly power at its core. Those who wield it must be prepared to dance with the very fabric of reality."
item.armament.event_horizon.desc.3: Right click to dislodge the black hole, allowing the user to manipulate it to their will, sucking in nearby mobs. Distance thrown is based on charge time
item.armament.resonance_pickaxe.desc.1: "This ornate lance, forged in the depths of a swirling vortex, holds within it the secrets of the cosmos. A miniature black hole, stabilized and contained, pulses with an otherworldly power at its core. Those who wield it must be prepared to dance with the very fabric of reality."
item.armament.resonance_pickaxe.desc.3: Right click to dislodge the black hole, allowing the user to manipulate it to their will, sucking in nearby mobs. Distance thrown is based on charge time
